price: 55 C’est ainsi que Nous exposons Nos enseignements afin que se distingue clairement le comportement des criminels.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَلِتَسۡتَبِينَ سَبِيلُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nufaṣṣilu al-āyāti walitastabīna sabīlu al-muj'rimīna
